open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

closed.title: Afrihost Outage | KwaZulu Natal
closed.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting some clients in KwaZulu Natal. Afrihost engineers are working on the issue. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

updates.content: The impact has been mitigated and we are monitoring the network for stability. We apologise for the issues experienced.
Additional impact has been detected. Afrihost network engineers are troubleshooting the root cause of the intermittent connection. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
Services have been restored, and we are currently monitoring.
Services have been restored, and we are currently monitoring.
Afrihost network engineers are actively troubleshooting the root cause of the intermittent to no connectivity issues in KwaZulu Natal. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

closed.title: MetroFibre outage | Paradise Beach, Jeffreys Bay

closed.resolution: Please note that the fibre services in Paradise Beach - FSH, Paradise Beach, Jeffreys Bay have been restored.
